data.title: ‘I Figured Out the Secret of Writing Hits’: Cole Porter's 'Jewish' Side
data.meta_description: In the 1920s, Composer-lyricist Cole Porter Started Inserting Jewish-sounding Motifs Into His Songs. Was His Invented Jewishness Part of the Array of Disguises He Assumed in Order to Escape His Sexual Identity?
